name: Andelion
overview:
Andelion - your shopping assistant helps you figure out what is the right model and where is the right price for your requirements.

Andelion is an online shopping community that connects shoppers with shop savvy scouts. Are you looking to purchase a laptop, smartphone, printer, vacuum, dishwasher, TV, gaming system or anything else? There are a seemingly infinite number of products to choose from, with an equally infinite number of product reviews. What is the right product for your individual parameters? How do you know that you’re getting the best deal?

That’s where Andelion comes in. It helps you figure out right model and price that fit within your guidelines. Think of it as your personal online shopping assistant. Let’s say you want to buy best camera for under $400, and you need it in a week or less.

All you have to do is “post your want” (i.e. lightweight,beginner interchangeable lens camera), short description of your requirements, pick a timeframe for your purchase (one week), and select your budget ($400 or less). The savvy online shopping community at Andelion will then give you expert recommendations and show you the best deals from around the web for the models that matches your requirements. All you have to do is choose which one you want to buy and place your order.
